title: Competency-Based Onboarding Program for Clinical Research Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic terminology in clinical research and foundational mathematics at the university level
context.additional_context: A medium-scale educational course combining competency-based learning and self-directed learning in limited technological environments (no PCs, smartphone-centric)

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three mathematical modeling techniques when designing clinical research protocols
Learners can generate two types of reports (basic/advanced) using statistical tools (smartphone app-based) during research data analysis
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans evaluating role-specific clinical research competencies by reflecting mentor-manager feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
